attributes.action: lobby Barnet Council to actively support the proposals for a new stadium for Barnet FC.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Barnet Football Club desperately need new a new stadium to replace their current antiquated facilities at Underhill.
The council in Barnet have consistently put up barriers to BFC's proposals for redevelopment, whilst not coming up with any tangible alternatives.
Keep the Bees alive!!
